named-query.name: WorkflowProcessLog.readByCorrelationKey
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessLog( log.processInstanceId,log.id,log.correlationKey,log.processId,log.start,log.end,log.duration,log.status ) FROM ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE log.correlationKey = :correlationKey

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessLog.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessLog( log.processInstanceId,log.id,log.correlationKey,log.processId,log.start,log.end,log.duration,log.status ) FROM ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE log.processId = :processId

named-query.name: WorkflowProcessLog.countByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(log) FROM ProcessInstanceLog log WHERE log.processId = :processId
